__TOC__

Carlo Marcelo was born in 1979 and have a degree in Political Science. He's written hundreds of songs and used to be in a band called Lost In The Veins, playing guitar and singing an amalgam of folk-rock-country in line with his heroes Gram Parsons, Ryan Adams, Neil Young, The Beatles amongst others. He is also an author of 3 books of poetry (Pigeons From Planet Peace, Modernong Bituin Kumpara Sa Alupihan, Surrealista Ng Taon) and a short novel (Eurekaeden), all unpublished in conventional form. For the past year, Carlo has developed a taste for Free Open Source Software, a believer in the ideals of Creative Commons, the power and convenience of Google and an enthusiast for Ubuntu. He now works in an outsourcing company as a Technical Support Representative for an American ISP client. He lives in Manila.
